Service Profile

Service profile is used to associate the Service Profile templates that was created earlier.

To configure service profile, perform the following:

 1. Select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the Number of Service Profiles Template in the textbox.

 3. Select the Profile Template from the drop-down box and click Add in the textbox and click Add to generate service profile

Figure 7-26 Service Profile

 4. Click Save and next to proceed further.
